artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,218.2); woman with a white gown with yellow and purple striped overgown, a red fan, and a tall green hat with yellow bows with pink floral centers and three tall yellow plumes with brown dots
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate I from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingt-septième Cahier, 10 Août 1787
